languages.text: {n}Маражай ухмыляется вам в ответ.{/n} "Как тонко подмечено, {name}. Целая кавалькада... в чем дело, Назракей? В чем причина такого внимания?"
{n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай ухмыляется вам в ответ.{/n} "Как тонко подмечено, {name}. Целая кавалькада... в чем дело, Назракей? В чем причина такого внимания?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst zurück.{/n} "Gut erkannt, {name}. Eine ganze Kavalkade ... Was ist geschehen, Nazrakhei? Was ist der Grund für all die Aufmerksamkeit?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst zurück.{/n} "Gut erkannt, {name}. Eine ganze Kavalkade ... Was ist geschehen, Nazrakhei? Was ist der Grund für all die Aufmerksamkeit?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋也对你露出了微笑。{/n}“好眼力，{name}。居然派了一整队人马……这是怎么回事，纳札骸？怎么搞出了这么大动静？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋也对你露出了微笑。{/n}“好眼力，{name}。居然派了一整队人马……这是怎么回事，纳札骸？怎么搞出了这么大动静？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Bien vu, {name}. Une cavalcade entière... Qu'y a-t-il, Nazrakhei ? Que me vaut toute cette attention ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Bien vu, {name}. Une cavalcade entière... Qu'y a-t-il, Nazrakhei ? Que me vaut toute cette attention ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te devuelve la sonrisa.{/n} «Bien visto, {name}. Es todo un desfile... ¿Qué sucede, Nazrakhei? ¿A qué viene tanta atención?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te devuelve la sonrisa.{/n} «Bien visto, {name}. Es todo un desfile... ¿Qué sucede, Nazrakhei? ¿A qué viene tanta atención?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがにやりと笑みを返す。{/n}「よくわかったな、{name}。全ての行進団…何があった、ナズラクヘイ？こんなに注目を浴びている理由はなんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがにやりと笑みを返す。{/n}「よくわかったな、{name}。全ての行進団…何があった、ナズラクヘイ？こんなに注目を浴びている理由はなんだ？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "İyi fark ettin {name}. Koca bir alay. Ne oldu Nazrakhei? Bu ilginin sebebi nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins back.{/n} "Well spotted, {name}. An entire cavalcade... What happened, Nazrakhei? What is the reason for all this attention?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai da sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "İyi fark ettin {name}. Koca bir alay. Ne oldu Nazrakhei? Bu ilginin sebebi nedir?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
